translations: n.束带；围绕物；（柱身两端的）环带
v.环绕；以带围绕；以带束住

sentences.sentence: And they would take a deep breath before they fasten their clothes cinctures. As a result of doing this, they could only stand up with the support of their hands against the wall.
sentences.translation: 他们系衣带之前，都要长叹一口气，然后才束紧腰带，这样一来往往要扶着墙壁才能站起来。
